name: Informants of the Painted Crow
description: Hailing from Kharthâ€™s Daggers, the Informants of the Painted Crow are renowned for their ability to nullify magic, and travel unseen even amidst extraordinary mages. Now renowned portrayers - those who are able to summon their imaginings into reality via brushstroke, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
